mapper.sql: wID, question, beginDate, endDate, comment, level, status
mapper.insert: insert into workrecord (wID, question, beginDate, endDate, comment, level, status, userID) values (#{wID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userID,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update workrecord
question = #{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
beginDate = #{beginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endDate = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},

userID = #{userID,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where wID = #{wID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
